bibl.title: Corpus Papyrorum Judaicarum. Volume III. With an epigraphical contribution by David M. Lewis.
bibl.note: C.P.Jud. III, 451-520. - Pp. 138-166 (by D.M.L.): Appendix I. The Jewish Inscriptions of Egypt.
bibl.seg: Tcherikover Victor A., Alexander Fuks and Menahem Stern (edited by), Corpus Papyrorum Judaicarum. Volume III. With an epigraphical contribution by David M. Lewis.
Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press, 1964, 4°, xvii-209 pp. et VI pll.
C.P.Jud. III, 451-520. - Pp. 138-166 (by D.M.L.): Appendix I. The Jewish Inscriptions of Egypt.

Feldman, CW 59 (1965) pp. 92-93. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 40 (1965) No. 80, pp. 507-512. - John R. Rea, CR N.S., 16 (1966) pp. 40-42. - Adelmo Barigazzi, Athenaeum N.S., 45 (1967) pp. 418-419. - B. Blumenkranz, Bulletin des Bibliothèques de France.
